ValidationRule.description: Business Type is required to move CD opportunity forward beyond Stage Prospeccion
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Business_Type__c,""), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CD_Opportunity', OR( TEXT(StageName)= 'Menu received', TEXT(StageName)= 'Editorial Queue', TEXT(StageName)= 'Terminals Queue', TEXT(StageName)= 'Closed Won', TEXT(StageName)= 'Promo and Logistics Queue', TEXT(StageName)= 'Design Approval' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please update the Business Type on the opportunity before moving forward with the Opportunity Stage
